article_title: All Centra hospitals participating in health insurance exchange
article_text:
Bedford County residents also have Aetna Life Insurance Company as an option on the exchange.

Danville-area residents have a choice between Coventry and Healthkeepers on the exchange. Coventry is offering two tiers of coverage. Those who select the tier 1 coverage will be directed to Danville Regional Medical Center. Centra will accept patients who select tier 2 coverage.

og.description: Bedford Memorial Hospital and Centra’s Lynchburg General, Virginia Baptist and Southside Community hospitals are just a few of the Central Virginia hospitals that will accept clients participating in the new health insurance exchange.
og.title: All Centra hospitals participating in health insurance exchange

article_metadata.description: Bedford Memorial Hospital and Centra’s Lynchburg General, Virginia Baptist and Southside Community hospitals are just a few of the Central Virginia hospitals that will accept clients participating in the new health insurance exchange.

article_summary:
Centra will accept patients who select tier 2 coverage.
Bedford County residents also have Aetna Life Insurance Company as an option on the exchange.
Those who select the tier 1 coverage will be directed to Danville Regional Medical Center.
Coventry is offering two tiers of coverage.
Danville-area residents have a choice between Coventry and Healthkeepers on the exchange.
